original_text: Nowhere in all the land were there found women as beautiful as Job’s daughters, and their father granted them an inheritance along with their brothers.
korean_text: 모든 땅에서 욥의 딸들처럼 아리따운 여자가 없었더라 그들의 아버지가 그들에게 그들의 오라비들처럼 기업을 주었더라

sentences.original_text: were there found women as beautiful as Job's daughters
sentences.korean_translation: 욥의 딸들만큼 아름다운 여인들을 찾을 수 없었다

sentences.original_text: an inheritance along with their brothers
